logic

Class URLServices

  • java.lang.Object
    • logic.URLServices

  • public class URLServices
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains functions to trim urls and generate hash. Created by Giuseppe Perniola on 26/02/2016.

    • Field Summary

      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static int MAX_TRIMMING_ATTEMPTS 
      private static java.lang.String STATISTICS_STR

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.lang.String createShortURL(java.lang.String longURL)
      finds if there is already a short url associated to the long url, if there isnt then generates a new short url
      static java.lang.String cutStatsChar(java.lang.String URL)
      cuts the special char for statistics at the end of the url
      static java.lang.String HashURL(java.lang.String longURL)
      Uses the SHA-1 hash algorithm to generate the hash of the long url
      static boolean isStatsURL(java.lang.String URL)
      Checks if the url ends with the special char needed to get the statistics from the db
      static java.lang.String trimDash(java.lang.String longURL)
      cuts the "/" from the end of the url
      static java.lang.String trimHashedURL(java.lang.String HashedURL, int startPos)
      Cuts the hash of the url
      static java.lang.String trimHttp(java.lang.String URL)
      adds the "http://" at the begin of the url

      • isStatsURL

        public static boolean isStatsURL(java.lang.String URL)
        Checks if the url ends with the special char needed to get the statistics from the db
        Parameters:
        URL - the url to check
        Returns:
        true if the short url is requesting the statistics, false otherwise
